name: Patapon 3
description:
Now playable on your PS Vita*

The critically-acclaimed rhythm-based adventure game is now available offering new quests, increased customization and all-new online battles. Play the campaign with your friends, go head-to-head, or take on a clan of other Patapon gamers with network play for up to eight people. You can also customize your tribe with different weapons and abilities before you head into battle in the greatest portable adventure of rhythm and war.

*Certain limitations apply to Wi-Fi connectivity.  Player responsible for Wi-Fi fees.
